dict.acceptation: 长袍；斗篷状覆盖物；墙帽；

sent.orig: How you manage and cope with alter is a sign of your professionalism and maturity.
sent.trans: 如何处理和应付变化是你的事业特性和成熟的标志。

sent.orig: These experiments suggest how different policy regimes cope with an uncertain world.
sent.trans: 这些实验演示了政策体系是如何随着世界的变化而变化的。

sent.orig: Bookstores now abound with manuals describing how to manage time and cope with stress.
sent.trans: 书店现在存在着大量手册描述如何去管理时间和缓解压力。

sent.orig: Oh, but my useless muscles couldn't even cope with a rickshaw."
sent.trans: 啊啊，但是我这一双弱腕，怕吃不下一部黄包车的重力。

sent.orig: I was unsure how I'd cope, but I was calm because she was calm.
sent.trans: 我原先不知道我该怎么办，但因为她的冷静，使我能够沉静下来。
